title: Freetown City F.C.
text: Freetown City Football Club, formerly known as Freetown United, is a <a href="Sierra%20Leonean">Sierra Leonean</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Freetown">Freetown</a>, <a href="Sierra%20Leone">Sierra Leone</a>. The club is currently playing in the <a href="Sierra%20Leone%20National%20First%20Division">Sierra Leone National First Division</a>, the second highest football league in Sierra Leone. Freetown United was once one of the biggest football club in Sierra Leone during the 1960s and 1970s.
